Notes
-----
Color Theory presents Depeche Mode is a one-man tribute to Depeche Mode,
complete with two new instrumental interludes. The album reinvents eleven
of their most underappreciated songs, and also includes the track "Ponytail
Girl," the Color Theory original that was mistakenly credited as a Depeche
Mode track from their Exciter album. To this day, several European web
sites sell alternate versions of Exciter with "Ponytail Girl"included as a
so-called "bonus track." Depeche-Mode.com wrote of the tribute CD, "We give
it the thumbs up and warmly recommend that all Mode fans pick this one up."

If you like this release, you will like Color Theory's new album "The
Thought Chapter" even more! Please visit and support the artist at <a href="
http://www.colortheory.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.colortheory.com</a>

NOTE: Unlike another widely seeded torrent, this one actually contains
track 7 "World Full of Nothing"
